requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.00GHz 800MHz 2MB
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is a highly recommend to run on the Laptop pc.
